contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 14, 1999 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (First Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (First Section) 10 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-first-section
Stantonbury Theatre, Milton Keynes, Buckinghamshire, England, UK Bands played an entertainment programme including Simoraine. 11 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Graeme Lewis, Cornet, Swindon Pegasus
1st Prize: £350.00 (Secklow Challenge trophy) 2nd Prize: £100.00 (Scot Meats trophy) 3rd Prize: £60.00 (Volkswagen (Gb) trophy) Best instrumentalist: Graeme Lewis (cornet) Swindon Pegasus Brass
March 7, 2011, 5:14 p.m. April 18, 2013, 5:22 a.m.
1 Hyde Band Peter Wise
2 Flixton Band Martin Obermuller
3 Luton Band Phillip Littlemore
4 Swindon Pegasus Brass John Winterflood
5 Towcester Studio Band John Fletcher
6 Nottingham City Transport Band Martin Heartfield
7 Kibworth Band Ian Scott
8 Haverhill Silver Band Charles Shipp
9 Hathern Band Dave Newman
10 Enderby Band John Broadhurst
Withdrawn Hanwell Band John Durrant
